name: Inkubus Sukkubus - She of a Thousand Names
name_original: Inkubus Sukkubus - She of a Thousand Names
description:
Play as a medieval witch collecting hidden items (CD albums) in a variety of environments. 16 of the albums to be collected are then added to your jukebox, which can then be played whilst you explore further.

Travel through several different environments including ancient temples, a medieval village, spooky woodlands, vampire’s castles, and a storm-lashed coastal outcrop to collect the various CDs and Vinyl releases of the band Inkubus Sukkubus. Sixteen of these albums will be added to your jukebox which you can then play whilst you continue to explore. Your collected items are automatically stored when you leave the game, so that when you return they will be there waiting for you. The Game can also be reset so if you wish you can begin all over again.

Inkubus Sukkubus are a Pagan Gothic Rock Band Who have been touring and releasing albums since they formed in 1989. They have played in Australia, Russia, Mexico, USA, Scandinavia, Most of Europe and the UK, They have to date released 27 albums, and the band are currently playing live and working on new material.

Inkubus Sukkubus formed in the summer of 1989 when Tony McKormack, Candia Ridley and Adam Henderson met at college studying graphic design. They shared an interest in paganism, witchcraft and vampirism as well as making original music from an early age, and so the type of band that was to emerge from the joining of forces was, quite naturally, an expression of this. Initially the band was called Incubus Succubus. The original aim of the band was (as it still is today) to be the vehicle in which the celebration of the Pagan experience could be conveyed.
